name: openstack
excerpt: Juju makes it easy to deploy OpenStack at scale. Quickly and reliably build an enterprise-scale cloud run on Ubuntu - the most popular operating system for OpenStack.

bundles.name: OpenStack
bundles.summary: This bundle deploys a basic OpenStack Cloud (Mitaka release) on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, providing Dashboard, Compute, Network, Block Storage, Object Storage, Identity and Image services.

bundles.name: OpenStack with Nova-LXD
bundles.summary: This bundle deploys an OpenStack Cloud (Mitaka release), configured to use LXD (the lightweight container hypervisor), on Ubuntu 16.04, providing Dashboard, Compute, Network, Object Storage, Identity and Image services.

bundles.name: OpenStack Autopilot
bundles.summary: The Canonical Distribution - Enterprise OpenStack Install and Management.
